hotels.hotel: Secluded Oasis for Romantic Getaway @Bare Chic
hotels.desc: Bare Boutique Stays are a chain of mignon-cute apartments that may hide in an old picturesque building or a townhouse. The architectural characteristics that embody Saigon. At the heart of an eventful Saigon. Where a leisure walk of less than 10 minutes may bring you to a promenade by a peaceful river under a contiguous tree canopy, to the nearby Saigon Zoo and Botanical Gardens.
complaint: This is the best place I've ever been in Saigon. Just like the pictures, it is clean, and cozy, with easy access to the hot spots. I have nothing to complain about this place and definitely gonna book it again whenever I'm back to Saigon.
It was my perfect stay with Bare. Highly recommend in the city. Absolutely will be back soon!

hotels.hotel: Botanist Lab cozy room in Tan Dinh by CIRCADIAN
hotels.desc: Welcome to the Botanist Lab! We are a quirky, little homestay located in less hectic area of central Saigon. Our minimalist room features a queen bed, daybed with laptop table, bluetooth speaker and a private bathroom with rain shower.The room is in a newly remodeled house that has been turned into a coliving space. Guests will also have access to a shared kitchen, a large working area and a washer/dryer. We are only 15 minutes from the airport and 15 minutes from Ben Thanh Market!
complaint: This is the best place I've ever been in Saigon. Just like the pictures, it is clean, and cozy, with easy access to the hot spots. I have nothing to complain about this place and definitely gonna book it again whenever I'm back to Saigon.Highly recommended for the great hospitality and comfort this place offers.
We stayed in a few different Botanist Lab rooms over the past month and couldn‚Äôt have been happier.

hotels.hotel: The Peace Concept - 6 Capsule Beds in City Center
hotels.desc: Peaceful and quiet place in the hustle and bustle center of Saigon. It's a place where you can have a sound sleep in your cozy capsule bed after a full day experiencing the city.
